name: IS_INTER_INTRA_COMP_APPROVAL_REQ
label: INTER/INTRA COMPANY APPROVAL REQUIRED
description: If true - Validate user for approval if inter/intra deal is selected from Oil UI, will allow inter/intra company deal only if there is 1 level of approval and 1 level of sub approval with self approval for the loggedIn user; If false - approval validation for user and approval popup are skipped for inter/intra company deals
